author: newsr.in
title: DROID Turbo 2 and DROID Maxx 2 Exposed in Leaked Promotional Material
text: We reported last week Verizon and Motorola plan to launch new smartphones on October 27. The “culprits” are DROID Turbo 2 and DROID Maxx 2, sequels of popular smartphones that were offered by the Big Red not too long ago. Both DROID Turbo and DROID Maxx were solid devices even though they were missing microSD c... »
